item.title: Farewell
item.description:
Reconing

Lets start with the basiscs to see what ports are open
lets scna the ports with nmap and sS flag for
-sS means Half-Open scan , is a scan quite fast and silent scan which scans for TCP SYN
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transmission_Control_Protocol
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SYN


very basiscs ports open , ssh and https , lets check the site


nothing interesting here just a basic login page

apart from that we can find an interesting banner at the top of the site with some active users , maybe we can try some of the mfor the username

item.title: padelify
item.description:
reconing

First thinks first , its time to look for information

I tried running a gobuster scan with a common wordlists for discovery but nothing returned , surely a WAF( web aplication firewall )is blocking the acces

lets try to bypass it , using the flag -a bypass it pretty simple
for noobies (like me ) the -a flag uses a diferent user agent than the default gobuster agent ,
a user agent is a string of character that make the request to the site
